Text: Still doesn't work with win7 x64, even after updating to 1.01 patch and setting everything to run in admin with winxp compatibility. Same Tages driver error.
Ok, I figured out how to make it work with Win7 x64. Do all of the above steps AND go to the Tages website and get the new x64 exe. It worked like a charm.

@ enya64 at

Hm, I wasn't aware that the game uses a different executable on x64 systems. Will count that in, thanks.

Many thanks! After downloading 3 other cracks containing viruses, this one did the trick.

Got the ISO from another torrent. Downloaded the 1.01 patch for the game, then installed this crack. Works like a charm. No need for CD key.

I'm on Winxp pro sp3. nvidia 8800gtx card with 195.62 drivers. About an hour into gameplay. No issues yet.
